Text.Page:
If you think you're up to a bigger challenge, head north to Liberation Station. That's where some of the toughest fighting is.

Find {@LinkCreature:227#1008#Velnen}. He's always got room for a 'real hero.'

Don't worry too much about Ellahne. She's a bit over her head and she snaps at people because of it.

On the other hand, this is the thick of the fighting and we're often up against Thulsa's best. We could definitely use a soldier like you.
